content:
# The movement command to the nearest Coal resource patch has not provided any immediate feedback.
# I will attempt to harvest Coal directly from the nearest patch to ensure I gather sufficient resources to continue smelting.

# Let's harvest 10 units of Coal again to proceed with the smelting process.
harvest_resource(position=nearest_coal_patch, quantity=10)  # Harvesting 10 Coal units from the patch.
print(f"Inventory after harvesting Coal: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check inventory after harvesting.
